---
category: news
title: "Olympus to acquire cloud-AI endoscopy startup Odin Vision"
excerpt: "Olympus announced today that it agreed to acquire cloud-based AI endoscopy technology developer Odin Vision. The agreement totals up to $79 million in upfront and milestone-based payments. London-based Odin Vision develops a portfolio of commercially available computer-aided detection/diagnostic (CAD) solutions."
